parameters.name: SecurityTransfers.SponsorOrIssuer
parameters.description: Is the security held with a sponsor or issuer.

parameters.name: SecurityTransfers.HinOrSrn
parameters.description: Is the security transfer held under a HIN or SRN.

parameters.name: RegularWithdrawal
parameters.description: Bank account to be used for regular withdrawals.

parameters.name: RegularWithdrawal.Amount
parameters.description: Amount of regular transaction from the account.

parameters.name: RegularWithdrawal.Frequency
parameters.description: Monthly = 1, ThreeMonthly = 3, SixMonthly = 6, Annually = 12, Quarterly = 13, HalfYearly = 14.

parameters.name: RegularWithdrawal.CommencementDate
parameters.description: The commencement date of the regular transaction.

parameters.name: RegularWithdrawal.TerminationDate
parameters.description: The termination date of the regular transaction.

parameters.name: RegularContribution
parameters.description: Bank account to be used for direct debiting regular contribution plan.

parameters.name: RegularContribution.Amount
parameters.description: Amount of regular cash contributions to the account.

parameters.name: RegularContribution.Frequency
parameters.description: Monthly = 1, ThreeMonthly = 3, SixMonthly = 6, Annually = 12, Quarterly = 13, HalfYearly = 14.

parameters.name: AccountSetup
parameters.description: To be used for regular SMA accounts.

parameters.name: AccountSetup.InitialTransferValue
parameters.description: Estimated total in-specie value for transfers into the account.

parameters.name: AdviserId
parameters.description: The Adviser ID to create the application under.

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: The entity type of the account. Individual = 0, Trust = 1, Corporate = 2, Partnership = 3, Superfund = 4, Joint = 5.

parameters.name: Fees.FeeType
parameters.description: FeeTable = 0, Contribution = 1, Establishment = 2, Termination = 3, Withdrawal = 4, Ongoing = 5.

parameters.name: Fees.IsPercent
parameters.description: Whether the fee is a percent.

parameters.name: BankAccounts.Usages
parameters.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

parameters.name: ContributionSources.EntireBalance
parameters.description: Whether the entire balance of the external fund account will be transferred.

parameters.name: ContributionSources.ExpectedAmount
parameters.description: Expected contribution amount to be transferred. Set if ContributionSources.EntireBalance is false.

parameters.name: Transfers
parameters.description: Contains details on other SuperSMA account(s) to be transferred to this account.

parameters.name: Transfers.TransferFromAccountId
parameters.description: Account ID of the other SuperSMA account to transfer to this account.

parameters.name: Transfers.TransferMethod
parameters.description: WholeAmountWithClose = 0, WholeAmountKeepOpen = 1, SpecifiedAmount = 2 - whether the source account will be kept open.

parameters.name: Transfers.Amount
parameters.description: If Account.Transfers.TransferMethod is WholeAmountKeepOpenSpecifiedAmount, the amount to be transferred.

parameters.name: OtherContributions
parameters.description: Contains details of other assets that will be used to fund this account.

parameters.name: OtherContributions.ContributionType
parameters.description: Unknown = 0, Concessional_Employee = 11, Concessional_Personal = 12, Concessional_OtherFriendsAndFamily = 13, NonConcessional_Personal = 21, NonConcessional_SpouseAndChild = 22, NonConcessional_FirstHomeSaverAccount = 23, Exempt_CGT_15Year = 31, Exempt_CGT_Retirement = 32, Exempt_PersonalInjuryElection = 33, Other_GovernmentCoContribution = 41, Other_LowIncomeSuperContribution = 42, Downsizer = 43.

parameters.name: OtherContributions.ExpectedAmount
parameters.description: Expected other contribution amount to be transferred.

parameters.name: EmployerContributions
parameters.description: Contains details of other assets that will be used to fund this account.

parameters.name: InitialInvestmentAmount
parameters.description: The amount of cash that will be invested in the account.

parameters.name: InitialInvestmentType
parameters.description: Unknown = 0, Concessional_Employee = 11, Concessional_Personal = 12, Concessional_OtherFriendsAndFamily = 13, NonConcessional_Personal = 21, NonConcessional_SpouseAndChild = 22, NonConcessional_FirstHomeSaverAccount = 23, Exempt_CGT_15Year = 31, Exempt_CGT_Retirement = 32, Exempt_PersonalInjuryElection = 33, Other_GovernmentCoContribution = 41, Other_LowIncomeSuperContribution = 42, Downsizer = 43.

parameters.name: ContributionType
parameters.description: Unknown = 0, Concessional_Employee = 11, Concessional_Personal = 12, Concessional_OtherFriendsAndFamily = 13, NonConcessional_Personal = 21, NonConcessional_SpouseAndChild = 22, NonConcessional_FirstHomeSaverAccount = 23, Exempt_CGT_15Year = 31, Exempt_CGT_Retirement = 32, Exempt_PersonalInjuryElection = 33, Other_GovernmentCoContribution = 41, Other_LowIncomeSuperContribution = 42, Downsizer = 43.

parameters.name: Consolidation
parameters.description: Establish an accumulation account. You can open an accumulation account in the same application alongside a pension account. Only available for SuperSMA Pension.

parameters.name: Consolidation.UseExisting
parameters.description: Link an existing SuperSMA accumulation account to the pension account.

parameters.name: Consolidation.AccountCode
parameters.description: AccountCode of the linking SuperSMA Account.

parameters.name: Consolidation.TransferMethod
parameters.description: WholeAmountWithClose = 0, WholeAmountKeepOpen = 1, SpecifiedAmount = 2 - whether the source account will be kept open.

parameters.name: Consolidation.Amount
parameters.description: Specifies the amount of the transfer from the existing account.

parameters.name: Consolidation.CloseOnRollover
parameters.description: Specifies whether the Account provided should be closed on successful rollover.

parameters.name: PensionPayments
parameters.description: The payment amount paid from the pension account. Only available for SuperSMA Pension.

parameters.name: PensionPayments.Amount
parameters.description: Amount of regular transaction from the account.

parameters.name: PensionPayments.Frequency
parameters.description: Monthly = 1, ThreeMonthly = 3, SixMonthly = 6, Annually = 12, Quarterly = 13, HalfYearly = 14.

parameters.name: PensionPayments.CommencementDate
parameters.description: The commencement date of the regular transaction.

parameters.name: PensionPayments.TerminationDate
parameters.description: The termination date of the regular transaction.

parameters.name: CentrelinkSchedule
parameters.description: If a Centrelink schedule is required.

parameters.name: AdviserId
parameters.description: The Adviser ID to create the application under.

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: The entity type of the account. Individual = 0, Trust = 1, Corporate = 2, Partnership = 3, Superfund = 4, Joint = 5.

parameters.name: Fees.FeeType
parameters.description: FeeTable = 0, Contribution = 1, Establishment = 2, Termination = 3, Withdrawal = 4, Ongoing = 5.

parameters.name: Fees.IsPercent
parameters.description: Whether the fee is a percent.

parameters.name: BankAccounts.Usages
parameters.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

parameters.name: Applicants
parameters.description: Objects containing the applicant data. There must be at least one applicant for the request to succeed. The array of objects may contain a mix of Individual and Corporate applicants.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Contact.PepDetails
parameters.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Signatories.Capacity
parameters.description: Director = 0, SoleDirector = 1, CompanySecretary = 2, Partner = 3, Trustee = 4, SignedUnderSeal = 5, SignificantShareholder = 6, Beneficiary = 7.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Signatories.PepDetails
parameters.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Identifications
parameters.description: Array of TFN / TIN / ABN / NIN

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Identifications.MissingReasonText
parameters.description: Reason identification of applicant is missing.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.ContactIsSignatory
parameters.description: Whether the contact is a signatory on the account.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.TradingName
parameters.description: Trading name of the corporate applicant.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.Identifications.MissingReasonText
parameters.description: Reason identification of applicant is missing.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.Title
parameters.description: Title: Mr, Mrs, Ms, Miss, Doctor, Lady, Prof and Sir.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.DateOfBirth
parameters.description: Date of birth of the individual

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.Phone
parameters.description: Primary contact number of the individual

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.PepDetails
parameters.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

parameters.name: Accounts
parameters.description: Array of accounts to be opened with the application. Must be linked to an included applicant.

parameters.name: Accounts.BankAccounts.Usages
parameters.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

parameters.name: Accounts.Exclusions.Security
parameters.description: The security code of the exclusion.

parameters.name: Accounts.Exclusions.Security.Code
parameters.description: The security code of the security.

parameters.name: Accounts.Exclusions.Security.Exchange
parameters.description: The exchange code of the security.

parameters.name: Accounts.InitialInvestment.Cash
parameters.description: Select if the inital investment will include cash.

parameters.name: Accounts.InitialInvestment.Shares
parameters.description: Select if the inital investment will include shares.

parameters.name: AdviserId
parameters.description: The adviser ID to create the application under.

parameters.name: OwnerAdviserId
parameters.description: The owner adviser ID to create the application under.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 client ID provided by Praemium.

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 client secret provided by Praemium.
